client.misc

Interface IWaitView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IOverlayView, IView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WaitView

    public interface IWaitView
extends IOverlayView
    Interface for the wait view, which is used to display wait dialogs to the user
